title: Forms for proof of loss furnished
context: ยง431:10H-235 Standard format outline of coverage; group and individual policies. This section implements, interprets, and makes specific, the provisions of section 431:10H-112 in prescribing a standard format and the content of an outline of coverage, as follows: (1) The outline of coverage shall be a freestanding document, using no smaller than ten-point type; (2) The outline of coverage shall contain no material of an advertising nature; (3) Text that is capitalized or underscored in the standard format outline of coverage may be emphasized by other means that provide prominence equivalent to the capitalization or underscoring; (4) Use of the text and sequence of text of the standard format outline of coverage is mandatory, unless otherwise specifically indicated; and (5) The format for outline of coverage shall be substantially similar to the Outline of Coverage in section 29 of the April, 2002, NAIC Long-Term Care Insurance Model Regulation. [L 1999, c 93, pt of ยง2; am L 2007, c 233, ยง25] Revision Note Subsection designation deleted pursuant to ยง23G-15.
